org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Class TextEventDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text.TextEventDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Describable, EventDAO

    @ThreadSafe
public class TextEventDAO
extends Object
implements EventDAO, Describable

    DAO that reads events from a text file, one per line. Events are formatted according to an EventFormat.

    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Detail

      • ratings

        public static TextEventDAO ratings(File file,
                                   String delim)

        Open a rating DAO with the default layout and automatic compression.

        Parameters:
        file - The file.
        delim - The delimiter.
        Returns:
        A DAO that parses ratings from file using DelimitedColumnEventFormat.
        See Also:
        ratings(File, String, org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io.CompressionMode)

      • ratings

        public static TextEventDAO ratings(File file,
                                   String delim,
                                   CompressionMode mode)

        Open a potentially-compressed file of ratings. It uses the default layout:

        1. User
        2. Item
        3. Rating
        4. Optional timestamp
        Parameters:
        file - The file to open.
        delim - The delimiter.
        mode - The compression mode.
        Returns:
        A text event DAO.

      • describeTo

        public void describeTo(DescriptionWriter descr)
        Description copied from interface: Describable

        Write this class’s description to a sink. Anything relevant to this object’s identity should be digested; the idea is that, barring hash collisions, two objects with the same digest are equivalent. Used for things like deterministically generating cache file names.

        Specified by:
        describeTo in interface Describable
        Parameters:
        descr - The description writer to use.
